org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

Interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of AssembledReads which were used to build this contig.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AceContig, AsmContig, AsmUnitig, TasmContig, TigrContig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultContig

    public interface Contig<T extends AssembledRead>
    A Contig is a CONTIGuous region of genomic data. Contigs are assembled by overlapping reads to form a consensus.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsRead(String readId)
      Does this contig have a AssembledRead with the given id?
      NucleotideSequence getConsensusSequence()
      Get the consensus sequence of this contig.
      String getId()
      Get the id of this contig.
      long getNumberOfReads()
      Get the number of reads in this contig.
      T getRead(String id)
      Get the AssembledRead in this contig with the given id.
      StreamingIterator<T> getReadIterator()
      Get the StreamingIterator of AssembledReads that are contained in this contig.
      default ThrowingStream<T> reads()
      Create a Stream of the AssembledReads in this contig.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Get the id of this contig.
        Returns:
        the Id of this contig as a String; will never be null.

      • getNumberOfReads

        long getNumberOfReads()
        Get the number of reads in this contig.
        Returns:
        the number of reads in this contig; will always be ≥ 0.

      • getReadIterator

        StreamingIterator<T> getReadIterator()
        Get the StreamingIterator of AssembledReads that are contained in this contig.
        Returns:
        a StreamingIterator of AssembledReads; will never be null and never contain any null elements, but could be empty.

      • getConsensusSequence

        NucleotideSequence getConsensusSequence()
        Get the consensus sequence of this contig. The Consensus is determined by the underlying reads that make up this contig. Different consensus callers can create different consensus using various criteria and paramters.
        Returns:
        the consensus of this contig as NucleotideSequence; will never be null.
        See Also:
        ConsensusCaller

      • getRead

        T getRead(String id)
        Get the AssembledRead in this contig with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the read to get.
        Returns:
        the AssembledRead with that id; or null if no such read exists in this contig.
        See Also:
        containsRead(String)

      • containsRead

        boolean containsRead(String readId)
        Does this contig have a AssembledRead with the given id?
        Parameters:
        readId - the id of the AssembledRead to check for.
        Returns:
        true if this contig has a read with the given id; false otherwise.

      • reads

        default ThrowingStream<T> reads()
        Create a Stream of the AssembledReads in this contig. By default, this method delegates to getReadIterator()'s StreamingIterator.toThrowingStream() method.
        API Note:
        Jillion Version 5.3 changed the return type to be ThrowingStream instead of Stream.
        Returns:
        a new ThrowingStream of reads.
        Since:
        5.0
